projects.name: Algorithm Visualizer
projects.description: Developed an interactive algorithm visualizer using JavaFX, allowing users to visualize the step-by-step execution of sorting algorithms like Selection Sort, Bubble Sort, and Merge Sort. The application features a user-friendly interface, enabling real-time input manipulation and adjustable speed controls for enhanced learning of algorithmic behavior and complexity. Built using Java 22 and IntelliJ, the project demonstrates strong object-oriented programming skills and proficiency in JavaFX for creating dynamic visual applications.

projects.name: Credit Card fraud detection using Machine Learning Algorithms
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to detect fraudulent credit card transactions. Utilized a dataset acquired from Kaggle and implemented various algorithms including Decision Tree, K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN), XGBoost, and Random Forest. Analyzed the performance of each model to identify the most effective algorithm for fraud detection.

experiences.description: Demonstrated proficiency in development by creating and maintaining user-friendly and visually appealing web applications. Successfully implemented functionalities to enhance customer experience and streamlined processes. Additionally, honed problem-solving skills through effective debugging and issue resolution, ensuring smooth and efficient website operations.
